snippet.title: Trails in the Sky 1st Chapter - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
This 1st look at Estelle, Joshua, and the gangs' battle moves take center stage in stunning 3D as they travel a familiar path through Ruan. Trails fans, prepare to relive the adventure with all-new gameplay mechanics, enhanced visuals, and more.

Coming Fall 2025 to Steam, PS5, and Nintendo Switch! www.trailsfirstchapter.com #TrailsintheSky1st
